description: The accident happened in dense fog.
title: Seven dead after helicopter crash on outskirts of Istanbul
title_page: Seven dead after helicopter crash on outskirts of Istanbul | Daily Mail Online
text:
All seven people on board a helicopter which crashed on the outskirts of Istanbul have died.
The cityâ€™s mayor, Kadir Topbas, confirmed the death toll had risen after the incident on Friday morning.
Officials had earlier said five bodies were recovered from the scene of the crash, without providing information on the fate of two others.
Firefighters at the site in Istanbul's Buyukcekmece district (Cem Bakirci/Depo Photos via AP)
Earlier reports said four Russian nationals, a Turkish citizen and two pilots were on board.
The helicopter apparently hit a television tower in dense fog.
